text:
If only you knew how prophetic this was...
We apparently all associate Cornelius with Soap box derbies.

text: Oh God, I just woke up after passing out after looking at your avatar.

text: "I am such a fraud. This is so empty."

text:
Wish I could double chubby. The connection between his comment and avatar went 10 months unnoticed, but you nailed it.

Damn fine work.

text: good for him.  i hope he wins.

text: Philippe's ears are really highlighted in this strip.

name: wulvaine
text: A comment left by wulvaine was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by phthoggos, fakead, sex_bicycle, dinner, bixschmix, stormagnet, pogo, aperson)

name: snowman
text: Man, seriously?  I get down on stuff sometimes too, but I mean...you have a better plan?

name: canusdivinus
text: We could all just die. Die to DEATH.

name: wulvaine
text: Not particularly, haha. I didn't really intend for that to be taken seriously.

name: zapatos
text: Phillipe.

name: i_love_kate
text: Philippe?

name: zapatos
text: Philippe is my better plan, he is AMERICA's better plan.  He is the superlative president.

name: aperson
text: He's the presidentest?

name: dissembly
text: *Democracy*-democracy? Not, representative, first-past-the-post, non-preferential, money-infected, lobbyist-infested Presidential "democracy"?

name: dissembly
text: Don't blame me, i voted for Kodos.

name: canusdivinus
text: Take your lame and never question Mr. Bear again.

name: dissembly
text: You did't deserve all those lames. Republican-bashing is entirely valid. However, i think the problem is, you could say exactly the same about the Demmocrats.

name: dissembly
text: Huh. I was half-thinking about writing "Demmycrats" to lighten the tone of my comment, i guess the double-M sort of seeped through...

name: mockereo
text:
god i hate seepage.

like the urine that is seeping through my pants.

name: aaron_haynes
text: The birth of a legend.

name: petro
text: It's a shame that he could never be President, as is he is thirty years too young and was born outside of the US.

name: shoinan
text: Didn't stop Harry Truman.

name: neoboman
text: After seeing the final panel, how can you monsters not vote 5.

name: evolume
text: the "Goodthingatarians" are pro-things and anti-otherstuff.  It's anarchy, basically.

name: charchar
text:
Don't thank Phillipe: thank Anarchy!

Also, I am sending a write-in vote for Phillipe come November.

name: zapatos
text: Well he is always carrying around that cookbook with him eh.

name: tttt
text: Philippe knows it is that easy

name: drycup
text: The Philipe arcs make life beautiful again.

name: drycup
text: The Philippe arcs are really good too.

name: mattylite
text: But forget about those Philipppe ones.  They are a tad... excessive.

name: snowman
text: Wow, I had to read this like five times.  Nice.

name: dominus101
text: I wish there was someone to vote for that was half as sincere and likeable as Philippe

name: cameasiam
text: Was I the only one that actually wrote Philippe in on the ballot?

The Libertarian Party is mega-nasty. It is DOGSHIT.

What's passive-aggressive about that? It's not like I lamed you anonymously.

text: Unless the chainsaw lobbyists get to him.

name: c_dizzle
text: This makes me so happy. So HAPPEEEE!!!

text: Phileppe running for president is actually one of my favorite subplots in Achewood.

name: drago25
text: I missed Mr. Bear

text: I would vote for Philipe. We wouldn't go to war, we would just hug the fuck out of everyone.

text: I would vote the shit out of any ticket which had Phillippe on it

text: Lie Bot would trick him into going to war

text: Kind of the saddest thing ever.

text: I really like this.  (It might be the vodka.)

Constitutionally, Philippe can't be elected. Philippe is twenty years too young.

Philippe is five.

you think he gives a FUCK about the Constitution?

yeah right

text: Where can I get an Achewood absentee ballot?  I fully support the Party For HUUUGS!  He should get THESE KNIVES for VP.
